LanguageData.TTT.MultipliersTT: What values to multiply with when calculating the tend-time
LanguageData.TTT.HeavyBleedingTT: If the patients total bleed-rate is above 75%, with a larger increase when above 125%
LanguageData.TTT.LowBleedingTT: If the patients total bleed-rate is below 25%, with a larger decrease when no bleeding
LanguageData.TTT.LifeThreateningTT: If an injury is life threatening the tend-time will increase
LanguageData.TTT.MissingTT: If the bodypart is missing fully the tend time will increase heavily
LanguageData.TTT.PermanentTT: If an injury is permanent, the tend-time will decrease
LanguageData.TTT.InternalTT: If an injury is internal the tend-time will increase heavily
LanguageData.TTT.ExternalTT: If an injury is external the tend-time will decrease
LanguageData.TTT.VerboseLoggingTT: Will show the amount of tend-change as well as the reasons
